p: Territory of Washington, County of Spokane}ss Joesph Bradshaw, W.D. Gillespie, John Maibes To Pearl Worthington Ruby Stanley M. Bauer Dr. Morgan C. Cusuka In the name of the United States, you are hereby required to appear before the undersigned, one of the Justices of the Peace, in and for the said County, on the 26th day of June 1886, at 1 o'clock P.M. at his office in Spokane Falls, W.T. to give evidence in a certain cause then and there to be tried between the Territory of Washington Plaintiff and Ray Raymond Defendant
On the part of the Territory
Given under my hand this 26 day of June 1886
J.J.L. Paul Justice of the Peace
